gw.plugin.workqueue

Class IBatchCompletedNotification

  • gw.plugin.workqueue.IBatchCompletedNotification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin

    public class IBatchCompletedNotification
implements com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    This plugin is called whenever the Batch Monitoring task discovers that all the work for a given batch running on a workqueue has completed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void completed(ProcessHistory batch, int workItemsFailed)
      Called when a batch process completes...

    • Method Detail

      • completed

        void completed(ProcessHistory batch,
             int workItemsFailed)
        Called when a batch process completes...
        Parameters:
        batch - completed batch. Use {@link ProcessHistory#getProcessType()} to get the type of the batch process. Do not modify this object, it is not in a bundle so all modifications will be lost.
        workItemsFailed - number of failed work items generated by this batch process. -1 if there is no work queue associated with the batch process. 0 if all work items succeeded.
